title: T202 and T205 Just back from SGC including Cobb's!
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: T202 and T205 Just back from SGC including Cobb's!
posts.post_content:
All prices are net to me and include insured delivery to you.  I collect sales tax from New York delivery addresses.  A great group of T202's and a couple of T205's.  "I'll take it" trumps negotiations.

A Desperate slide for third Cobb/O'Leary  SGC 2.5   $1950 (SOLD)
Chief bender Waiting for a good one  Bender/Thomas  SGC 3.5   $375
Evers makes a safe slide   CHance/Evers  SGC 2.5  $300 (SOLD)
Good play at third   Cobb/Moriarity  SGC  4   $3250
Just before the battle  Bresnahan/McGraw   SGC  2.5   $250
Ty Cobb steals third  Austin/Stovall   SGC  2.5   $575 (SOLD)

T205  Ciccotte  SGC 3  $325
T205 Wallace no cap one line stats SGC 1.5   $799 (SOLD)
